Combat
Hit Points: 31 Initiative: 1 Armor Class: 15 Attacks Per Round: 2
Armor Proficiency: Heavy; Light; Medium; Shield Weapon Proficiency: Martial Weapons; Simple Weapons
Armor: Scale Mail Shield: None Weapons: Dart (+5 1d4+1 R20/60); Greatclub (+2 1d8-2); Sickle (+2 1d4-2); Unarmed (+2 1-2)
Combat Notes:

Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +1
Extra Attack: +1 Attacks Per Round
Strength Attack Adjustment: -2
Strength Damage Adjustment: -2
Divine Smite: Can spend a spell slot after a successful melee attack to inflict 1d8 HP radiant plus 1d8 HP per slot level, up to a maximum of 5d8 HP; undead and fiends suffer an additional 1d8 HP
Fighting Style (Protection): Can use a reaction and a shield to inflict disadvantage on attacks targeting an adjacent creature
Mounted Combatant: Has advantage on melee attacks on an unmounted foe smaller than mount and can redirect attacks on mount to self
Turn The Faithless: R30' Can use Channel Divinity to make fiends and fey flee (save DC 15 Wisdom negates) for 1 min

Save Notes:
Aura Of Courage: R10' Self and allies have immunity to fright
Aura Of Protection: R10' Self and allies +3 all saves
Aura Of Warding: R10' Self and allies have resistance to spell damage
Divine Health: Has immunity to disease
Mounted Combatant: Mount suffers no damage on a successful Dexterity save and half on failure
Magic
Spell Slots: P1: 4; P2: 3; P3: 2 Attack: P: 7 Spell DC: P: 15
Spells:
Aid (P2 Abju): R30' 3 targets gain +5 hit points for 8 hr [+Level gives +5 temporary hit points]
Aura Of Life (P4 Abju): 30' radius gives nonhostile creatures resistance to necrotic damage and immunity to maximum hit point reduction, and raises those with 0 hit points to 1 hit point, for concentration up to 10 min
Aura Of Purity (P4 Abju): 30' radius gives nonhostile creatures resistance to poison damage, immunity to disease, and advantage on saves vs. conditions for concentration up to 10 min
Aura Of Vitality (P3 Evoc): R30' Self can use a bonus action to restore 2d6 hit points to a target once per rd for concentration up to 1 min
Banishing Smite (P5 Abju): Next successful self weapon attack inflicts +5d10 HP force, plus banishment to home plane or a demiplane for concentration up to 1 min if the attack reduces the target below 51 hit points
Banishment (P4 Abju): R60' Banishes the target to its home plane or a demiplane (save Charisma negates) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Bless (P1 Ench): R30' 3 targets gain +1d4 on attacks and saving throws for concentration up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Blinding Smite (P3 Evoc): Next successful self weapon attack inflicts +3d8 HP radiant and blinds (save Constitution ends) for concentration up to 1 min
Branding Smite (P2 Evoc): Next successful self weapon attack inflicts +2d6 HP radiant and lights the target for concentration up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Circle Of Power (P5 Abju): Allies in a 30' radius have advantage on saves vs. magic, and saves yields no damage instead of half, for concentration up to 10 min
Command (P1 Ench): R60' Target obeys a one-word command from self (save Wisdom negates) for 1 rd [+Level affects +1 target]
Compelled Duel (P1 Ench): R30' Target stays within 30' of self (save Wisdom negates) and suffers disadvantage on attacks on others for concentration up to 1 min; self attacking another or a successful attack on the target by an ally ends
Create Food And Water (P3 Conj): R30' Creates 45 lb of food and 30 gallons of water
Crusader's Mantle (P3 Evoc): Ally attacks in 30' radius inflict +1d4 HP radiant for concentration up to 1 min
Cure Wounds (P1 Evoc): Touched regains 1d8+3 hit points [+Level restores +1d8 HP]
Daylight (P3 Evoc): R60' Target centers a 60' radius bright light for 1 hr
Death Ward (P4 Abju): Touched retains 1 HP when next reduced to 0 HP or survives the next death effect within 8 hrs
Destructive Wave (P5 Evoc): 30' radius inflicts 5d6 HP thunder, knocked prone, and 5d6 HP of a choice of radiant or necrotic (save Constitution half HP only) on chosen targets
Detect Evil And Good (P1 Divi): R30' Reveals aberrations, celestials, elementals, feys, fiends, undead, consecration, and desecration for concentration up to 10 min
Detect Magic (P1 Divi): R30' Reveals magic auras and their schools for concentration up to 10 min [R]
Detect Poison And Disease (P1 Divi): R30' Reveals poison, poisonous creatures, and diseases for concentration up to 10 min [R]
Dispel Evil And Good (P5 Abju): Celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead suffer disadvantage on attacks vs. self for concentration up to 1 min; a successful spell attack returns them to their home plane (save Charisma negates), and touch also ends their enchantment, fright, or possession on the creature touched
Dispel Magic (P3 Abju): R120' Ends the effects on the target of a spell up to level 3, and successful DC 10 + spell level checks end each higher-level spell [+Level ends any spell of equal or lesser level]
Divine Favor (P1 Evoc): Self weapons inflict +1d4 HP radiant for concentration up to 1 min
Elemental Weapon (P3 Tran): Touched weapon gains +1 attack and +1d4 HP damage of a choice of acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder for concentration up to 1 hr [+Level gives +2 or +3 attack and +2d4 or +3d4 damage at level 5 or 7]
Ensnaring Strike (P1 [Oath Of The Ancients] Conj): Next successful self attack restrains the foe and inflicts 1d6 HP per rd piercing (save Strength ends) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Find Steed (P2 Conj): R10' Self gains the service of a summoned spirit in steed form
Geas (P5 Ench): R60' Target obeys self instructions (save Wisdom negates) for 30 days [+Level extends the duration to 1 yr or permanently at level 7 or 9]
Heal (D6 Evoc): R60' Target regains 70 hit points and recovers from blinded, deafened, and diseased [+Level restores +10 hit points]
Heroism (P1 Ench): Touched gains immunity to fright and +3 temporary hit points each rd for concentration up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Lesser Restoration (P2 Abju): Touched recovers from a choice of blindness, deafness, disease, paralysis, or poison
Locate Creature (P4 Divi): Reveals the location of a specified creature or species within 1000' for concentration up to 1 hr; running water blocks
Locate Object (P2 Divi): Reveals the location of a specified object or type within 1000' for concentration up to 10 min; lead blocks
Magic Circle (P3 Abju): R10' 10' radius prevents a choice of physical entry or exit (save Charisma allows magical transit), inflicts disadvantage on attacks, and negates charm, fright, and possession by one or more choices of celestials, fey, fiends, or undead, for 1 hr [+Level extends the duration +1 hr]
Magic Weapon (P2 Tran): Gives touched weapon a +1 magic bonus for concentration up to 1 hr [+Level gives a +2 or +3 bonus at level 4 or 6]
Misty Step (P2 [Oath Of The Ancients] Conj): Teleports self 30'
Moonbeam (P2 [Oath Of The Ancients] Evoc): R120' 5' radius inflicts 2d10 HP radiant (save Constitution half; shapechangers have disadvantage and revert form on failure) and can move 60' per rd for concentration up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d10 HP]
Plant Growth (P3 [Oath Of The Ancients] Tran): R150' Causes plants in a 100' radius to overgrow or enriches a 1/2 mile radius for 1 year
Protection From Energy (P3 [Oath Of The Ancients] Abju): Touched gains resistance to a choice of acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage for concentration up to 1 hr
Protection From Evil And Good (P1 Abju): Willing touched gains immunity to charm, fright, and possession from aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead and advantage on saves vs. existing conditions for concentration up to 10 min; those creatures also suffer disadvantage on attacks on the target
Protection From Poison (P2 Abju): Touched recovers from 1 poison and gains advantage on saves vs. poison and resistance to poison damage for 1 hr
Purify Food And Drink (P1 Tran): R10' Removes poison and disease from nonmagical food and drink in a 5' radius [R]
Raise Dead (P5 Necr): Restores life with 1 hit point to and removes nonmagical diseases and poisons from a willing touched 10-day-old corpse; target suffers -4 attacks, saves, and ability checks, reduced by 1 for each long rest
Remove Curse (P3 Abju): Frees a touched creature from all curses or breaks the attunement to a touched cursed object
Revivify (P3 Necr): Restores life and 1 hit point to a touched 1-minute-old corpse
Searing Smite (P1 Evoc): Next successful self weapon attack inflicts +1d6 HP fire, plus 1d6 HP fire per rd (save Constitution ends) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP initial]
Shield Of Faith (P1 Abju): R60' Target gains +2 AC for concentration up to 10 min
Speak With Animals (P1 [Oath Of The Ancients] Divi): Self can talk with animals for 10 min [R]
Staggering Smite (P4 Evoc): Next successful self weapon attack within concentration up to 1 min inflicts +4d6 HP psychic, disadvantage on attacks and ability checks for 1 rd, and loss of reactions for 1 rd (save Wisdom HP only)
Thunderous Smite (P1 Evoc): Next successful self weapon attack inflicts +2d6 HP thunder and a 10' push (save Strength HP only) for concentration up to 1 min
Wrathful Smite (P1 Evoc): Next successful self weapon attack inflicts +1d6 HP psychic and frightens (save Wisdom ends) for concentration up to 1 min
Zone Of Truth (P2 Ench): R60' Creatures in a 15' radius cannot lie (save Charisma negates) for 10 min
Magic Notes:
Channel Divinity: Can use a Channel Divinity effect once per short rest
Lay On Hands: Can heal 50 hit points per long rest and can use 5 hit points' worth to cure a disease or neutralize a poison
Nature's Wrath: R10' Can use Channel Divinity to create spectral vines that restrain the target (save DC 15 Dexterity or Strength ends)
Spellcasting: Can cast spells from the paladin spell list
